moves.1. b4: This is a series of the best matches in a mini tournament of the Orangutan Opening
moves.2. e4 Bxb4: This is nice start for black, most common is to exchange the pawns with the bishop
moves.3. c3 Bc5 4. Nf3 Qf6: White didn´t see a more concentrated attack on the king side
moves.6... d6 7. O-O: I dont think this is good
moves.9... c6 10. Bc4 Qg6: Anunciated going for castle breaking, note Bb3 in a great position
moves.13. Nh4 Qf6 14. Nf5: He blocks the queen but now theres no turning back
moves.14... Bxf2+: This is a massive attack, pictoric
moves.15. Kh1 Bxe1 16. Nxd6 Qf3+: Takes rook, knight can take black rook but its too late
moves.17. Kg1 Qg2#: Abismal checkmate, is been said that in orangutan op, savage attacks are usually seen, well lets see, thank you!
